SQLs.SQL: select dizhibm,dizhimc from GY_FUWUJG group by dizhibm,dizhimc

select subjg.dizhibm, count(*) huochanzs from cdh_newbornrecord nr left join cdh_deliveryrecord dr on nr.chanshibh = dr.chanshibh left join cdh_pregnantinfo pi on pi.chanshibh = dr.chanshibh left join GY_FUWUJG subjg on dr.visitunitcode = subjg.fuwujgbh where pi.realregioncode != pi.homeaddress and nr.outcomeofbirth = 1 and pi.ownerarea != 1 and dr.tianbiaosj >= @日期范围Start and dr.tianbiaosj < dateadd(day,1,@日期范围End) and subjg.dizhibm in ( select dizhibm from GY_FUWUJG ) group by subjg.dizhibm

select p.* ,p.低危早产儿数 + p.高危早产儿数 早产儿人数 ,p.低危早产儿数 登记管理人数低危 ,p.高危早产儿数 登记管理人数高危 from ( select subjg.dizhibm, sum(case when h.highrisktype like concat('%',01,'%') then 1 else 0 end) 低危早产儿数, sum(case when h.highrisktype like concat('%',18,'%') then 1 else 0 end) 高危早产儿数 from cc_highrisk h left join cc_generalinfo g on h.childid = g.childid left join GY_FUWUJG subjg on g.manaunitid = subjg.fuwujgbh where h.status = 1 and h.registerdate >= @日期范围Start and h.registerdate < dateadd(day,1,@日期范围End) and subjg.dizhibm in ( select dizhibm from GY_FUWUJG group by dizhibm ) group by dizhibm ) as p

select h.childid, subjg.dizhibm, sum(case when h.highrisktype like concat('%',01,'%') then 1 else 0 end) 低危早产儿随访人数, sum(case when h.highrisktype like concat('%',18,'%') then 1 else 0 end) 高危早产儿随访人数 from cc_highrisk h left join cc_generalinfo g on h.childid = g.childid left join GY_FUWUJG subjg on g.manaunitid = subjg.fuwujgbh left join cc_physicalexam_new p on h.childid = p.childid where h.status = 1 and p.childId is not null and h.registerdate >= @日期范围Start and h.registerdate < dateadd(day,1,@日期范围End) and subjg.dizhibm in ( select dizhibm from GY_FUWUJG group by dizhibm ) group by dizhibm,h.childid

select subjg.dizhibm, sum(case when h.highrisktype like '%01%' then 1 else 0 end) 低危早产儿专案管理人数, sum(case when h.highrisktype like '%18%' then 1 else 0 end) 高危早产儿专案管理人数 from cc_highrisk h left join cc_generalinfo g on h.childid = g.childid left join GY_FUWUJG subjg on g.manaunitid = subjg.fuwujgbh left join Analysis_SpecialCase p on h.childid = p.childid and (p.finishedAt is not null or getdate() < dateadd(day,1,p.GeneratedAt)) where h.status = 1 and p.childId is not null and p.isValidCase = 1 and h.registerdate >= @日期范围Start and h.registerdate < dateadd(day,1,@日期范围End) and subjg.dizhibm in ( select dizhibm from GY_FUWUJG group by dizhibm,dizhimc ) group by dizhibm
